name: 2018/10/19 Dinner Chicken Paprika
description: This high-protein, healthified dinner recipe featuring Chicken Paprika is perfect for those looking to enjoy a hearty, nutritious meal. Packed with rich spices like paprika and cumin, and loaded with vegetables such as capsicum, onion, and eggplant, this dish is not only flavorful but also contributes to a healthy diet. Topped with parmesan cheese and served alongside baby potatoes, it's a well-rounded meal that's sure to satisfy.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven for roasting baby potatoes at 200°C (400°F).
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the baby potatoes and cut them into halves. Place them on a baking tray, drizzle with a bit of oil and season with salt. Roast in the oven until golden and tender, about 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: While the potatoes are roasting, dice the red onion, chop the capsicum (green and red), and slice the eggplant.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Crush the garlic and cut the chicken into bite-size pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a large pan over medium heat, add the garlic, onion, and chicken. Season with paprika and cumin. Cook until the chicken is browned and cooked through, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the capsicum and eggplant to the pan. Cook until the vegetables are soft, about 5-7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Beat the eggs in a bowl, then pour over the chicken and vegetable mixture in the pan. Allow the egg to set slightly before stirring to combine everything, cook for another 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle shredded Parmesan cheese over the top and let it melt into the hot chicken and vegetable mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the chicken paprika hot with the roasted baby potatoes on the side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
